name: Savior (itch) (Shreyas)
description:
This is a Submission to the Ludum Dare 46 Game jam

A simple Pixel-art Style game, where you as the player should save Him by collecting medkits and defending yourself from the shooter.
Please leave your Feedback and suggestions in the comments.

Controls:

Arrow keys controls the player.

Collect the medKits and keep him alive until the timer runs out.
